Html:
On Windows 7 Professional and Windows Vista Ultimate (two different machines I've tried), installing Configuration Section Designer 1.6.1  fails with message:

"Source file not found C:\users\ACCOUNT\AppData\Local\Temp\Temp1_ConfigurationSectionDesigner.zip\Readme.htm. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it."

What I have to do is go to that location, open the zip file and create a blank Readme.htm inside of it, then click the installer's [Try Again] button for it to complete.
This problem was reported in workitem 7652 and has since been fixed. The installer, starting with version 1.7 will no longer have this problem.
